cast.overview: Eight-year-old Kevin McCallister makes the most of the situation after his family unwittingly leaves him behind when they go on Christmas vacation. When thieves try to break into his home, he puts up a fight like no other.
cast.title: Home Alone
cast.character: Woman with Baby on Flight to Paris (uncredited)

details.biography: Irene Columbus is an American actress. She was known for Home Alone (1990) and Nine Months (1995). She is the husband of A.M. Columbus and the mother of Chris Columbus.
details.name: Irene Columbus
